; let mainBranchRoot = document.getElementById("main-branches"); let featureBranchRoot = document.getElementById("feature-branches"); branches.forEach(branch => { let li = document.createElement("li"); li.className = "py-2 text-white"; li.innerHTML = `${branch} - Angular | React`; if (mainBranches.indexOf(branch) !== -1) { mainBranchRoot.appendChild(li); } else { featureBranchRoot.appendChild(li); } }); });
